resources.string: Due to highly constrained resources,\ndevelopment and testing have only occurred on the\nASUS MeMO Pad 7 ME176CX
Recommended Keyboard is a\nLogitech 920-003390 Tablet Keyboard for Android 3.0 Plus

APPLICATION NAVIGATION
 CTRL + SHIFT + comma
 Open Frame Spinner (left menu)
 CTRL + ALT + comma
 Open Right Menu Spinner
 CTRL + [
 Select previous Left Menu option
 CTRL + ]
 Select next Left Menu option
 CTRL + SHIFT + 1-9
 Click on item N (1-9) in the Left Menu
 CTRL + ALT + 1-9
 Click on item N (1-9) in the Right Menu


HORIZONTAL NAVIGATION
 CTRL + SHIFT + ]
 Navigate to next FMM peer fractal
 CTRL + SHIFT + [
 Navigate to previous FMM peer fractal
 ALT + SHIFT + ]
 Navigate to last FMM peer fractal
 ALT + SHIFT + [
 Navigate to first FMM peer fractal
 CTRL + SHIFT + | (pipe)
 Open navigation spinner


MOVE THE CURSOR
 ALT + Left Arrow
 Move to the beginning of the current line. Note: that this is not the beginning
 of the paragraph on a multi-line (wrapped content) paragraph
 ALT + Right Arrow
 Move to the end of the current line. Note: that this is not the end of
 the paragraph on a multi-line (wrapped content) paragraph
 CTRL + Left Arrow
 Move to the previous word
 CTRL + Right Arrow
 Move to the next word
 CTRL + ALT + Left Arrow
 Move to end of first paragraph
 CTRL + ALT + Right Arrow
 Move to end of last paragraph (end of document)
 TAB
 Move to end of next paragraph
 TAB + SHIFT
 Move to end of previous paragraph


SELECT TEXT
 ALT + SHIFT + Left Arrow
 Select all text from cursor position to beginning of line. Note: This is not the
 beginning of the paragraph on a multi-line paragraph
 ALT + SHIFT + Right Arrow
 Select all text from cursor position to end of line. Note: This is not the end of
 the paragraph on a multi-line paragraph
 >>> CTRL + SHIFT + Left Arrow
 Select the previous word
 >>> CTRL + SHIFT + Right Arrow
 Select the next word


PARAGRAPH SELECTION
 >>> CTRL + SHIFT + Up Arrow
 Add previous paragraph to paragraph selection list
 >>> CTRL + SHIFT + Down Arrow
 Add next paragraph to paragraph selection list


SEQUENCING
 >>> ALT + Up Arrow
 Sequence selected paragraph(s) up
 >>> ALT + Down Arrow
 Sequence selected paragraph(s) down


SEARCH
 >>> CTL + f
 Prompt for a string, and find next occurrence (with wrapping)
 >>> CTL + n
 Find next occurrence (with wrapping) of last search


SAVING DATA
 CTL + s
 Save all modified data
 CTL + r
 Revert all modified data to last version saved
